entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 15 April 2023
